about_the_game:
The soundtrack of Pampas & Selene that includes 79 music tracks has been composed by Javier García (Gryzor87).

Gryzor87 is a Spanish composer. Some of his works are Cursed Castilla, Super Hydorah, Crimzon Clover World Ignition, Battle Princess Madelyn, Prisoner of War or The Curse of Issyos. He loves videogames, synths and movies.

This OST is divided into:

1.- PC VERSION
Recorded with Korg Triton synthetizers, Roland JV-1080 and Yamaha DX7 FM sounds.

2.- MSX VERSION
Original MSX soundtrack with SCC and PSG chips.
